about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of William's Curse where you find yourself awakening as a young girl named Emily within a peculiar and tumultuous school setting. To escape this maze environment, you must navigate through the tasks on each level, avoid the eccentric educators and confront the root cause of this chaos: William, the malevolent teacher who manipulates the minds of the other teachers.

There are levels in the school with their own set of obstacles and tough teachers to face. You will need to confront William at the last floor to end his curse and bring yourself, your friend “Helpscreen” to safety, as well as the school staff.

There are many levels of difficulty to choose from:

  • The “Lil Puss” mode is ideal for new players interested in exploring the school without worrying about any threats. The surroundings are well lit granting you the freedom to navigate. This game mode enables you to get familiar with the school.

  • Newcomers to the game will find that the “Boi Difficulty” offers an easy way to ease into the challenges ahead. The questions from the teachers are quite straightforward and simple to solve. This lets you concentrate more on exploring the school environment and understanding how the game works. The instructors move at a pace which gives you ample time to respond to questions. This mode is crafted to boost your self-assurance and get you ready for stages, in the game.

  • The “Default Difficulty” provides a challenge, for players seeking a typical gameplay experience. Solving questions in this difficulty level demands some consideration without being too overwhelming.

  • Are you prepared for the ultimate test yet? The “Brainiac Difficulty” level transforms the game into a nightmare! The questions are seriously tough. Really put your knowledge and quick thinking to the test. You'll encounter some aggressive teachers who move swiftly and its crucial to get your answers right. Successfully completing this mode will unlock a separated achievement, for each level you complete.

  • The game includes a Hardcore Mode designed for players who seek the challenge experience! In this mode, after you choose the difficulty freely, you must complete all five levels without losing even once to progress further.

Now dive into the Game! Emily's Life is in your hands.

name: Angelica's Chaotic Hardcore School

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1330 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080, AMD Radeon RX Vega 64, or higher with at least 8 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1330 MB available space

short_description: Angelica's Chaotic Hardcore School is an Indie Horror Game inspired by Baldi's Basics in Education & Learning, featuring a young girl named Emily in a Chaotic School with 5 different floors. From Solving Math Problems to discovering new Science Experiments. Different Knowledge is Required!
supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support
